name: The Butterfly Defect.
description:
-------------------------------

Time is unstable.
Critical events collapsing.
Save the timeline.

-------------------------------

Description

Flap your wings and travel through the eras as you attempt to bring stability to the timeline.

-------------------------------

Controls

Movement: WASD / ZQSD / Arrows + SPACE

R = Restart

M = Mute Music

(? = Secret “Bonus” Mode)

-------------------------------

Made for Ludum Dare 49.
Theme: Unstable.
